actions.message: This command is only usable in the Staff Discord.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.title: We're sorry to see you go! :(

textInputs.name: Why are you leaving?
textInputs.placeholder: Why are you leaving the server?

actions.name: Show Modal

actions.message: Before submitting your reason, do you understand the following?
We're sorry to see you go. We've let Head Staff know, and you are now starting the resignation process.

embeds.title: What's next?
embeds.description:
You've now started the Resignation process. What's next?
‚Ä¢ We're going to remove your permissions from all server platforms within the next 24 hours.
‚Ä¢ A Head Staff will DM you when your permissions are removed.
‚Ä¢ :exclamation: **DO NOT LEAVE ANY DISCORDS.** If you do so, you will be **blacklisted**.
‚Ä¢ When the process is done, we will kick you from the Staff Discord or we will give you permission to leave.
embeds.footerText: (C) 2022 PvPBeach. Bot developed by NeverLand Services.

actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: :exclamation: Resignation Process
embeds.description:
${member} has started the resignation process.
Please remove their ranks from any server platforms, and DM them letting them know they're good to leave (when their permissions are revoked) or kick them from the Discord (with notice before kicking).

embeds.title: Resignation
embeds.description: ${member} - Resigned

actions.message:
We've cancelled your command.
Nothing of this has been logged.
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: Information you are submitting
embeds.description: Reason for resignation: ${tempVars("LEAVErsn")}
embeds.footerText: (C) 2022 PvPBeach. Bot developed by NeverLand Services.

embeds.title: By submitting, you understand that:
embeds.description:
‚Ä¢ Leaking any of the internal documents or announcements will result in a blacklist
‚Ä¢ You are able to request deletion of your staff data and player data (IP Addresses, staff information).
‚Ä¢ Griefing the server or the Discord will result in a blacklist
‚Ä¢ You may not be able to come back as a Staff Member anymore.
embeds.footerText: (C) 2022 PvPBeach. Bot developed by NeverLand Services.

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Please use this context menu in the staff discord.
actions.name: Send Message

You've promoted ${tempVars("user2hire")} to <@&${tempVars("idstaff")}>.

actions.name: Send Message

embeds.description: ${tempVars("user2hire")} - Promoted to <@&${tempVars("idstaff")}>

embeds.footerText: (C) 2022 PvPBeach. Bot developed by NeverLand Systems.

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: You require STAFF MANAGEMENT rank in the Discord to use this command.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Please use this context menu in the staff discord.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: :exclamation::exclamation: Would you like to blacklist this user aswell? :exclamation::exclamation:

embeds.title: Notice
embeds.description:
Dear ${tempVars("user2dolol")},

You've been demoted and blacklisted from the **PvPBeach Network**.
Please do not attempt to:
leak,
grief,
or do anything simular to that, as it could result in a `lawsuit or DMCA takedown`.

We wish you the best onwards,
The PvPBeach Staff Team.

actions.message:
You've sucessfully demoted and blacklisted this user.

If Discord is on a bad day, the bot might not have been able to ban them from the main discord.
Please ban them if it hasn't worked. Also, remember to remove their rank from in-game and other server platforms.
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: Demotion!
embeds.description: ${tempVars("user2dolol")} - Demoted & Blacklisted

embeds.title: Notice
embeds.description:
Dear ${tempVars("user2dolol")},

You've been demoted from the **PvPBeach Network**.
Please do not attempt to:
leak,
grief,
or do anything simular to that, as it could result in a `lawsuit or DMCA takedown`.

We wish you the best onwards,
The PvPBeach Staff Team.

actions.message:
You've sucessfully demoted.

If Discord is on a bad day, the bot might not have been able to remove their ranks from the main Discord.
Please do so. Also, don't forget to remove their rank from in-game and other server platforms!
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: Demotion!
embeds.description: ${tempVars("user2dolol")} - Demoted

actions.message: You've sucessfully cancelled the command.
